column5: I heard basket lake was up for sale? Any info or contact info on this. I have been there once and it was a pretty good camp, only one on the lake. Just curious. thanks.
[font color=green size=3][b]Basket Lake is Northeast of Dryden,Ont. a group I know goes there annually, and usually does OK on Walleyes.
any contact info for this camp as I have heard some good things about it.

The lodge we go to has an outpost on Little Basket. We almost went there for the day last year as the camp owner had some maintenance to do there. Anyway, they may know about it. Go to www.merkelscamp.com and give Terry or Merril a call. I don't think they check their email very often so I'd call!!!
